messages.subject: again with the streamload stuff
messages.msgSnippet: While our ever intrepid sedretarytocaptain3 gives you all that educational stuff I give you crass pop-culture! If you browse your way over to
messages.messageBody:
While our ever intrepid sedretarytocaptain3 gives you all that
educational stuff I give you crass pop-culture! If you browse your way
over to

http://www.streamload.com/Itou_sensei

password--miburo

you'll find a whole mess of images I've captured from the NHK drama,
Mibugishiden and a couple films starring some of the NHK actors, notably
Koichi Sato/Serizawa and Shosuke Tanihara/Itou. Saizou the pig from PMK
snuck in there as did that freaky cat who was hanging around Maro...

You will also find

The great Hijikata singing clip, a ZIP file (named: 001.zip) that
contains some very nice NHK actor shots, and some NHK Ikedaya raid stuff
(commercial clips and a wallpaper (All courtesy of Tama--what would we
do without you Tama???)

And a clip of the famed Mibugishiden "We're Shinsengumi,We Have Business
Here!"scene---courtesy of Alan (I believe this is also in our group
files section)

--

Barbara Sheridan
http://www.barbarasheridan.net



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
